languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно берет инфопластину и, после короткой паузы, решительно дробит его гидравлической серво-клешней. Его голос звенит от решимости:{/n} "Не такой ценой".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно берет инфопластину и, после короткой паузы, решительно дробит его гидравлической серво-клешней. Его голос звенит от решимости:{/n} "Не такой ценой".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно берет инфопластину и, после короткой паузы, решительно дробит его гидравлической серво-клешней. Его голос звенит от решимости:{/n} "Не такой ценой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は慎重にデータスレートを受け入れる。そして少しの間停止した後、水硬性サーヴォピンサーで閉じた。彼の声は毅然としていた。{/n}「大した代償ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は慎重にデータスレートを受け入れる。そして少しの間停止した後、水硬性サーヴォピンサーで閉じた。彼の声は毅然としていた。{/n}「大した代償ではありません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}小心翼翼地接过了数据板。短暂停顿片刻之后，触须上的液压伺服钳将数据板碾碎了。他开了口，声音中充满了决心。{/n}“这样的代价可不行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}小心翼翼地接过了数据板。短暂停顿片刻之后，触须上的液压伺服钳将数据板碾碎了。他开了口，声音中充满了决心。{/n}“这样的代价可不行。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} nimmt den Datablock vorsichtig entgegen und zerstört ihn nach einer kurzen Pause mit seiner hydraulischen Servozange. Seine Stimme ist resolut:{/n} "Nicht zu diesem Preis."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} nimmt den Datablock vorsichtig entgegen und zerstört ihn nach einer kurzen Pause mit seiner hydraulischen Servozange. Seine Stimme ist resolut:{/n} "Nicht zu diesem Preis."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} de Pasqal se saisit de la plaque et, après une courte pause, la brise en menus morceaux à l'aide de sa servotenaille hydraulique. Il répond d'un ton sans appel :{/n} « Pas à n'importe quel prix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} de Pasqal se saisit de la plaque et, après une courte pause, la brise en menus morceaux à l'aide de sa servotenaille hydraulique. Il répond d'un ton sans appel :{/n} « Pas à n'importe quel prix. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} de Pasqal acepta cuidadosamente la tablilla de datos y, al cabo de una breve pausa, la aplasta con su servopinza hidráulica. Su voz está llena de determinación:{/n} «El precio es demasiado elevado».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} de Pasqal acepta cuidadosamente la tablilla de datos y, al cabo de una breve pausa, la aplasta con su servopinza hidráulica. Su voz está llena de determinación:{/n} «El precio es demasiado elevado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentriti{/g} databelayı dikkatle alıyor ve kısa bir duraksamanın ardından hidrolik hizmokıskacıyla parçalıyor. Sesi son derece kararlı çıkıyor.{/n} "Böylesi bir bedel karşılığındaysa istemem."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} carefully accepts the data-slate and, after a brief pause, shatters it with its hydraulic servo-pincer. His voice is resolute:{/n} "Not at such a cost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}i databelayı dikkatle alıyor ve kısa bir duraksamanın ardından hidrolik hizmokıskacıyla parçalıyor. Sesi son derece kararlı.{/n} "Böylesi bir bedel karşılığında: Hayır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
